name: BLOCKLY
description:
You are trapped in an unknown world full of dangers, wild creatures are waiting for you at every turn!

In the new game BLOCKLY you explore, build and conquer the world composed entirely of blocks of the cubic form!

***Features***

Fully endless and randomly generated world!

Are distinct biomes (deserts, plains, forest, jungle, and more.)

The set of different creatures and animals!

-Thank Number of different items that can be created and used.

-Convenient Touch control

-And More.
